MstBrochure.name: Ganpat
MstBrochure.description: The digital Brochure for ganpat university.

PageText.textContent:
Ganpat University is located in Kherva, Mehsana, Gujarat, India.
It is managed by the Mehsana District Education Foundation.

Ganpat University provides graduate programs through the following institutions. U. V. Patel College of Engineering.
The college offers B.Tech programs in the following: 1)Computer Engineering. 2)Electronics and Communication Engineering 3)Informat

Facilities : The campus near Mehsana is spread over 300 acres (1.2 km) of land with more than 50,000 trees creating a lush-green and pollution free environment. 1)Staff-Quarters 2)Guest House 3)Shopping Center 4)Bank Counter 5)Open-Air Theater 6)Th
